trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Paducah
There were no other sightings in Paducah on or around October 16th 2008
divs: Sighting Detailsok. i have been watching for around 3wks a ufo in the western sky. it arrives always at sunset is disappears about 7 to 8 central time. i have a friend about an hr away that said she has been watching it for over a yr. it looks like it could be venus but its not. it looks close to venus but this slowly moves and sometimes flashes. i have been watching the stars and ufos now for over 12yrs. seen one in 98 up close about 30yards out. i will stand in a place where i can look at this light and pick out things around me so i can tell how much its moving and if its what i think it is. i know what an airplane looks like and this isnt it especially when it is hovering in place for hrs like it does. just thought for once i would tell somebody outside of my friends. david
